title: CBI Takes Over Hathras Probe From UP Police
description: The CBI will investigate the alleged gang rape and murder of a 20-year-old Dalit woman in Uttar Pradesh's Hathras district by a group of so-called "upper caste" men, taking over the case that has triggered a nationwide outcry.
content:
The police have come under sharp criticism for forcibly cremating the woman's body. (File)

title: Moratorium period exceeding six months may result in vitiating overall credit discipline: RBI to SC
description: In an affidavit filed in the apex court in the loan moratorium case, the RBI has said that a long moratorium period could impact credit behaviour of borrowers and increase the risks of delinquencies post resumption of scheduled payments.
